Export.Routine: WWWMENU6 ;WWWMENU6;DT;MENU SEPARAT MAP ;26.10.1999 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| MENU SEPARAT MAP ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| 14-Oct-2005 RPW SR13680: Make all $translate($piece(YA,Y,12),"/YUCI/","/"_$get(YUCI)_"/" into $$^WWWTRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,12),"/YUCI/","/"_$GET(YUCI)_"/") ;| DT 26.10.1999 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ;(C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK IF YANZ'="" DO BILD IF YBILD="" SET YANZ="" IF YANZ="" SET YBILD=$PIECE(YVOR,Y,2) IF YBILD="" DO ^WWWMENU1 QUIT ;KEIN BILDVORHANDEN ;no IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YBER=1!(YBER="") DO ;WENN ADMINISTRATOR = ANZEIGE DER NUMMERN . WRITE YCR . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE YCR . QUIT IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YBER'=1 IF YBER'="" DO . WRITE "" . QUIT WRITE "" WRITE YCR DO MAIN DO MAP WRITE "" WRITE YCR QUIT MAP ;SUCHEN MENUEPUNKTE AUS MAP ;seek out of SET YAPP="" IF YANZ'="" SET YAPP=$PIECE(YANZ,",",1) IF YAPP="" FOR SET YAPP=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,YAPP)) QUIT:YAPP="" DO MAP1 IF YAPP'="" DO MAP1 QUIT MAP1 ;UNTERPROGRAMME SET YNEUBILD=0 ;ABBRUCH DER ANZEIGE, WENN NEUES BILD GEFUNDEN SET YPROG="" FOR SET YPROG=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,YAPP,YPROG)) QUIT:YPROG="" DO QUIT:YNEUBILD=1 . IF YANZ'="" QUIT:$PIECE(YANZ,",",2)'=$EXTRACT(YPROG,1,$LENGTH($PIECE(YANZ,",",2))) . SET YA=$GET(^WWW004(0,YAPP,YPROG,1)) . ; . QUIT:$PIECE(YA,Y,16)="" ;KEINE MAP FÜR BILD ;no to portrait . IF $PIECE(YA,Y,2)="" IF $PIECE(YA,Y,12)="" QUIT:$PIECE(YA,Y,8)="" ;KEIN NEUES BILD FÜR UNTERPUNKT ;no something new portrait to . IF YANZ="" IF $PIECE(YA,Y,8)'="" SET YNEUBILD=1 ;NEUES BILD DANN KEINE BEARBEITUNG ;something new portrait no adaptation . ;BERECHTIGUNG . IF $DATA(^WWW0041(0,YAPP,YPROG,$$^WWWLANGU(YBED),1)) SET $PIECE(YA,Y,1)=$PIECE(^(1),Y,1) . SET YAA=$GET(^WWW004(0,YAPP,$PIECE(YPROG,".",1)_".",1)) . IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") QUIT:$$^WWWACCESS($PIECE(YA,Y,3),$PIECE(YA,Y,4))'=1 ;KEIN ZUGANG . ;IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YBER'=1 IF YBER'="" IF $PIECE(YA,Y,3)'="" IF $PIECE(YA,Y,3)'=99 IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,3),";",",")_",",","_YBER_",") QUIT . ;IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YBER'=1 IF YBER'="" IF $PIECE(YAA,Y,3)'="" IF $PIECE(YAA,Y,3)'=99 IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YAA,Y,3),";",",")_",",","_YBER_",") QUIT . ;IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YMOD'="" IF $PIECE(YA,Y,4)'="" IF '$FIND($PIECE(YA,Y,4),YMOD) QUIT . ;IF '$FIND(","_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YA,Y,6),";",",")_",",","_YBED_",") IF YMOD'="" IF $PIECE(YAA,Y,4)'="" IF '$FIND($PIECE(YAA,Y,4),YMOD) QUIT . SET YNAME=$$^WWWUML($PIECE(YA,Y,1)) . SET YFORM=$PIECE(YA,Y,2) . SET YPARA=$PIECE(YA,Y,7)_Y_$PIECE(YA,Y,5) . IF $PIECE(YA,Y,2)'="" DO QUIT . . NEW YNAME . . SET YNAME=$PIECE(YA,Y,1) . . SET YSHAPE=0 . . IF '$FIND($PIECE(YA,Y,16)," ") SET YSHAPE=$LENGTH($PIECE(YA,Y,16),",") . . SET YSHAPE1="POLYGON" ;POLYGONE . . IF YSHAPE=3 SET YSHAPE1="CIRCLE" ;KREISE . . IF YSHAPE=4 SET YSHAPE1="RECT" ;QUADRATE . . WRITE "" . . WRITE YCR . . QUIT . IF $PIECE(YA,Y,12)'="" DO QUIT ;URL . . NEW YNAME . . SET YNAME=$PIECE(YA,Y,1) . . SET YSHAPE=0 . . IF '$FIND($PIECE(YA,Y,16)," ") SET YSHAPE=$LENGTH($PIECE(YA,Y,16),",") . . SET YSHAPE1="POLYGON" ;POLYGONE . . IF YSHAPE=3 SET YSHAPE1="CIRCLE" ;KREISE . . IF YSHAPE=4 SET YSHAPE1="RECT" ;QUADRATE . . WRITE "" . . WRITE YCR . . QUIT . ; . IF $PIECE(YA,Y,8)'="" DO QUIT ;URL . . NEW YNAME . . SET YNAME=$PIECE(YA,Y,1) . . SET YSHAPE=0 . . IF '$FIND($PIECE(YA,Y,16)," ") SET YSHAPE=$LENGTH($PIECE(YA,Y,16),",") . . SET YSHAPE1="POLYGON" ;POLYGONE . . IF YSHAPE=3 SET YSHAPE1="CIRCLE" ;KREISE . . IF YSHAPE=4 SET YSHAPE1="RECT" ;QUADRATE . . WRITE "" . . QUIT . QUIT QUIT MAIN ;ZURÜCK OPTION OBEN LINKS ;back right of first refusal upstairs on the left IF YANZ'="" DO ;MAP FÜR ZURUECK ;to . NEW YANZ . SET YSHAPE1="POLYGON" ;POLYGONE . WRITE "" . WRITE YCR . QUIT QUIT BILD ;SUCHEN UNTERMAP ;seek SET YBILD="" SET YAPP=$PIECE(YANZ,",",1) QUIT:YAPP="" SET YPROG="" FOR SET YPROG=$ORDER(^WWW004(0,YAPP,YPROG)) QUIT:YPROG="" DO QUIT:YBILD'="" . QUIT:$PIECE(YANZ,",",2)'=$EXTRACT(YPROG,1,$LENGTH($PIECE(YANZ,",",2))) . SET YA=$GET(^WWW004(0,YAPP,YPROG,1)) . ; . QUIT:$PIECE(YA,Y,8)="" ;KEIN NEUES BILD FÜR UNTERPUNKT ;no something new portrait to . SET YBILD=$PIECE(YA,Y,8) . QUIT QUIT
